name: HealingNoise
0:
”Alexa open Healing Noise”
”Alexa ask Healing Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: healing noise
des:
Immerse yourself in meditative music designed to promote healing and relaxation. This skill provides soothing sounds and harmonious melodies to help you unwind and rejuvenate your mind and body.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Healing Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
